books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A novel about a totalitarian regime that employs extreme surveillance.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic novel about manners, marriage, and morality.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American Dream and the roaring twenties.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: The story of Captain Ahab's quest to avenge the white whale, Moby Dick.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A novel that intertwines the lives of individuals and the state in Russia during the Napoleonic era.

books.title: Crime and Punishment

books.description: A novel exploring the moral dilemmas of crime and justice.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A novel about teenage angst and alienation.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An epic high-fantasy novel set in the fictional world of Middle-earth.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A novel about a dystopian future where society is controlled by technology and conditioning.
